Sweden: Sweden enters the Seven Years' War.
Russia: Diplomatic Revolution: Under the Second Treaty of Versailles, Russia joined the Franco-Austrian military alliance.
Seven Years' War: Russian troops entered the war.
Indonesia: Salatiga treaty between Prince Sambernyawa with Pakubuwono III and Hamengkubuwono I further partitioning the remnant of Mataram Sultanate, the Mangkunegaran Grand Duchy was established.
Burma: Pegu captured; end of Restored Hanthawaddy
Bangladesh: Battle of Palashi. a decisive British East India Company victory over the Nawab of Bengal establishes Company rule in India.
